focus.zh: 把个人网站升级为 AI 时代长期资产
focus.en: Upgrade the site into a long-term AI-era asset

doing.zh: 持续发布实验日志，完善互动、订阅与 Ask Echo
doing.en: Publish experiment logs and improve community, subscriptions, and Ask Echo

notDoing.zh: 不做泛教程与热点堆叠

blockers.zh: 内容更新与系统迭代并行，时间管理压力较高
blockers.en: Running publishing and product iteration in parallel creates time pressure

nextActions.zh: 优化 Ask Echo 引用质量，并公开每周路线图进展
nextActions.en: Improve Ask Echo citation quality and publish weekly roadmap updates
